channel.title: Thread Per Client run error
channel.description:
Well I fixed my last error I had, now I have a new error when I try to log on.
[code] Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000 at java.lang.String.getBytes(Unknown Source) at stream.writeString(stream.java:203) at client.sendQuest(client.java:1098) at client.GtlvlfrXp(client.java:2619) at client.refreshSkills(client.java:2630) at client.initialize(client.java:2648) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at server.main(server.java:43)[/code]

item.title: Thread Per Client run error
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Well I fixed my last error I had, now I have a new error when I try to log on.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 1000 at java.lang.String.getBytes(Unknown Source) at stream.writeString(stream.java:203) at client.sendQuest(client.java:1098) at client.GtlvlfrXp(client.java:2619) at client.refreshSkills(client.java:2630) at client.initialize(client.java:2648) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at server.main(server.java:43)
